name: Shibarium DAO
public_notice: Shibarium DAO has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. For more information, please visit this post.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Shibarium DAO is the first decentralized organization founded to develop a community on the Shibarium blockchain. In addition to creating the community itself, we are also creating a special place for them in the form of a decentralized community platform where they can feel completely free.

ShibariumDAO will feature:
- Decentralized Social Media
- Token Launchpad
- Token Locker
